title: Police: Toddler accidentally shot in Dearborn County
content:
Emergency authorities responded Friday evening to Van Wedding Road in Sunman, Indiana for a reported accidental shooting.
Dispatchers said a 3-year-old child was accidentally shot.
The shooting occurred about 5:30 p.m.
Further information, including the nature of the unidentified child's injuries, wasn't immediately available.
The Enquirer will update this story.
